attributes.action: demand that the goverment builds more storage facilities to stop the voters being ripped off by the continental energy companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand that  the goverment must build more holding facilities for the gas reserves that we produce in the warmer months , when we do not require as much .France and germany hold 20% of their annual needs and the uk holds 5% . this is the main reason  which most people dont know is causing or fuel crisis in the gas and electricity as we sell the summer produced excess gas to the continent and then they rip us off when they sell it back !!!last year the flow of gas out of this country was FIVE TIMES THE IN-FLOW FROM THE CONTINENT . WHY ;  THE GOVERMENT MAKES MORE MONEY FROM TAX WITH THIS CRISIS !!!!
